    • Uses of TowerBase in towerstrategy

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CritterBase WeakestStrategy.executeStrategy(java.util.ArrayList<CritterBase> al, TowerBase towerShooter)

      To execute specific strategy.
      CritterBase NearestStrategy.executeStrategy(java.util.ArrayList<CritterBase> al, TowerBase towerShooter)
      To find the nearest critter among a critter arrayList.
      CritterBase FarthestStrategy.executeStrategy(java.util.ArrayList<CritterBase> al, TowerBase towerShooter)
      This method is used to find the critter which is farthest with the tower, and return it to the tower.
